Major_Arcs.title: The Circus Saga
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows a series of events within a circus, starting with performances and escalating into conflict, revenge, and ultimately, resolution as a new strongman emerges.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Arrival and Initial Performances
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the circus setting and initial characters, showcasing Paul Bunyan's strength and the public's reaction to the circus arrival and its attractions.

sub_scenes.title: Disturbance and Confrontation with Billings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the intervention of the man in the checkered shirt into a conflict caused by Billings, leading to a physical altercation and escalation with a pistol threat.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution with Matto Grasso and Paul Bunyan's New Role
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the aftermath of the conflict, introducing the circus owner, explaining the conflict with Matto Grasso, and proposing a new role for the man in checkered shirt, who is revealed to be Paul Bunyan.

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Revenge and Bunyan's Heroic Act
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Matto Grasso plotting and executing revenge, leading to a fire in the circus tent, which Paul Bunyan heroically resolves.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaim and Grasso's Envy

sub_scenes.title: Ape Release, Chase, and Grasso's Defeat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Grasso's further attempts at sabotage by releasing an ape, leading to a chaotic chase and Paul Bunyan's intervention, culminating in Grasso's capture and confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Ape's Release and the Keeper's Reaction

sub_scenes.title: Grasso's Final Defeat and Bunyan's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the conflict with Matto Grasso being defeated by 'Sonny' (Paul Bunyan), leading to Grasso's capture, a job offer for Paul Bunyan, and his ultimate decision to return to the North Woods.

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Marco Polo's fantastical encounter in Tibet, involving a talking head, a distressed kingdom, and a confrontation with a monstrous ogress, showcasing elements of folklore and adventure.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Encounter and the Talking Head Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo in Tibet and his bizarre encounter with a severed, talking head, setting up a supernatural element in his journey.

narrative_arcs.title: The Talking Head's Gratitude and Guidance

sub_scenes.title: Hi-toun and the Mourning Festival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to the city of Hi-toun, where Marco Polo encounters apparent celebration masking deep mourning due to the missing Princess Lotus.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Arrives in Mourning Hi-toun and Offers Assistance
Encounter with the Distressed Woman and the Suspicious Castle

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Castle and Rescue of Princess Lotus
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Marco Polo's perilous encounter in the ogress's castle, his confrontation with the ogress, and his eventual rescue of Princess Lotus using a magic knife.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Mysterious Castle and Unmasking the Ogress
Confrontation with the Ogress and Her Tusked Mice
Despair and Discovery of a Weapon
Dungeon Escape and Journey to Father
Palace Arrival, Reunion, and Refused Reward

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a tale of stolen treasure, betrayal, and revenge within a penal colony setting, highlighting the corrupting influence of greed and the long-term consequences of treachery.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Keeper Prologue and Penal Colony Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the treasure narrative with a prologue by the Treasure Keeper and shifts to a British penal colony where a prisoner seeks a deal with the Captain.

sub_scenes.title: The Deal for Treasure and Captain's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the prisoner's offer of treasure to Captain Brooking in exchange for escape, the Captain's deceitful agreement, and ultimate betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: Map Exchange and Promise of Freedom

sub_scenes.title: Years of Imprisonment and Jordan's Revenge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jordan's long imprisonment, his release, and his unwavering vow to seek revenge on Captain Brooking for the betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: Return to England and Renewed Vow of Revenge

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Violent Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Jordan's confrontation with Captain Brooking, leading to a midnight meeting at Brooking's home and a violent climax over the treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Violent Confrontation and Claim of Victory
Moral of the Story: Money is Evil

Major_Arcs.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dr. Styx investigating a haunted estate, revealing a story of murder, hatred, and supernatural resolution through forgiveness and love.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Dr. Styx and the Haunted Estate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx and the premise of a haunted estate, setting up the supernatural investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Realtor and the Supernatural Expert Discuss the Matthews Estate

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Ghostly Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dr. Styx's arrival at the haunted Matthews Place, ignoring warnings, and his initial confrontation with the ghost of Vincent Matthews.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Haunted Matthews Place
Ignoring the Warning and Entering the Haunted House
Confrontation with the Ghostly Figure Inside the House
Unwavering Confrontation and Declaration of Intent
Desperate Struggle and Reversal of Fortune
Questioning Violence, Fear, and the Path to Salvation
The Revelation of Rosalind's Murder and Fate

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Doomed Voyages
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts Henry Hudson's persistent but ultimately tragic quest for the Northwest Passage, detailing his voyages, crew discontent, and final mutiny leading to his demise.

sub_scenes.title: The Dutch East India Company Mission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the historical context of Henry Hudson's final voyage and details the Dutch East India Company's proposal for him to find the Northwest Passage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Enigma of Henry Hudson's Last Voyage
The Dutch East India Company's Proposal to Captain Hudson

sub_scenes.title: Voyage, Discontent, and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the initial voyage, rising crew tensions, a brief hope upon entering the Hudson River, disillusionment, and the eventual mutiny against Captain Hudson.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Disillusionment and the Decision to Turn Back
Trapped in Ice and Growing Despair
The Ice Melts and Voyage Resumes

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight and the Tartar Challenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the Arabian Knight Hassan's mission to rescue a kidnapped woman from the Tartar leader Kurgan, culminating in a trial by combat and a resolution based on honor and bravery.

sub_scenes.title: The Tartar Threat and the Caliph's Mission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Tartar threat, the Arabian Knight Hassan, and the Caliph's mission to rescue a kidnapped woman.

narrative_arcs.title: The Arabian Knight's Introduction and the Tartar Threat
Summoned by the Caliph for a Rescue Mission
The Journey to the Oasis of El-Sholem
Deserted Oasis and Discovery of Tartar Trail
Encounter and Warning from a Traveler
Offer of Water and Doubt on the Mission

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Capture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's infiltration into the Tartar camp, his encounter with a sentry, and his subsequent capture after attempting to contact the prisoner.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambush and Subjugation of the Sentry

sub_scenes.title: Trial by Combat and Honorable Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in the trial by combat proposed by Kurgan, detailing the fight, Hassan's initial defeat, and the honorable resolution where Kurgan keeps his word and departs peacefully, leading to a romantic conclusion for Hassan and the rescued woman.

narrative_arcs.title: Kurgan Keeps His Word and Bids Farewell
Woman Explains the Kiss and Praises Hassan
